game.name: Chicken Run: Eggstraction
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 은밀함, 어리석음, 그리고 엄청난 혼란! 치킨 런 세계관을 배경으로 펼쳐지는 이 협동 모험에서 자유를 향해 달려가세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stealth, silliness, and a whole lot of chaos! Scurry and scramble your way to freedom in this co-op adventure set in the Chicken Run universe.

reviewHighlights.text: Full Walkthrough: https://youtu.be/eEnkfmpC6ys Gameplay: Chicken Extraction Music: Good Story: Very Good Graphics: Very Good Here I will leave the cat...
